nodes.text: Han Solo was a male Ureallian who happened to be an old friend of Kane Starkiller and an acquaintance of Luke Skywalker's.
After Kane Starkiller's son Annikin Starkiller was made Luke Skywalker's Padawan learner, Kane traveled to the Gordon Spaceport to visit with Solo.
After the Assault on the Space fortress had failed, Skywalker ordered his subordinate, Montross to contact Solo and tell him that Luke needed to speak with him.
